definitions: A hole containing mud or in which mud collects, especially one which forms a defect or obstacle in a road; specifically a hot mud spring.
A hole at the base of a boiler, condenser, etc., through which sediment can be removed.
A despised place; a place of filth and squalor.
A situation or factor that impedes progress or entraps a person.

notes.text: Typically used in the context of an extended metaphor.
